StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATEDEGREE
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATEDEGREE(pIDDegree IN NUMBER, pDegreeName IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pLength IN NUMBER, pDegreePrerequisites IN VARCHAR2, pIDFaculty IN NUMBER) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE Degree_table deg&lt;br/&gt; SET deg.degreeName = pDegreeName,&lt;br/&gt; deg.length = pLength,&lt;br/&gt; deg.degreePrerequisites = pDegreePrerequisites,&lt;br/&gt; deg.idFaculty = pIDFaculty&lt;br/&gt; WHERE deg.idDegree = pIDDegree;&lt;br/&gt;END updateDegree;
